content.text: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3922, COMMUNITY HEALTH AND MEDICAL
content.speaker: Unknown

content.text: PROFESSIONALS IMPROVE OUR NATION ACT OF 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. The unfinished business is the vote on 
ordering the previous question on the resolution (H. Res. 601) 
providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3922) to extend funding 
for certain public health programs, and for other purposes, on which 
the yeas and nays were ordered.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore

content.text: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
content.speaker: The Clerk

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. The question is on ordering the previous 
question.
  This will be a 5-minute vote.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore

content.text:
The vote was taken by electronic device, and there were--yeas 230, 
nays 191, not voting 11, as follows:

                             [Roll No. 602]
content.speaker: The RECORDER

                Announcement by the Speaker Pro Tempore
content.speaker: None

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore (during the vote). There are 2 minutes 
remaining.


  So the previous question was ordered.
  The result of the vote was announced as above recorded.


 Moment of Silence in Memory of Victims of Terrorist Attack in New York
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore (during the vote)

content.text:
The SPEAKER. The Chair would ask all present to rise for the purpose 
of a moment of silence.
  The Chair asks that the House observe a moment of silence in memory 
of the victims of the terrorist attack in New York.


  Without objection, 5-minute voting will continue.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER

content.text: There was no objection.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text: The SPEAKER. The question is on the resolution.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER

content.text:
The question was taken; and the Speaker pro tempore announced that 
the ayes appeared to have it.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text: Ms. SLAUGHTER. Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.
content.speaker: Ms. SLAUGHTER

content.text: The yeas and nays were ordered.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text: The SPEAKER. This is a 5-minute vote.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER

nays 192, not voting 9, as follows:

                Announcement by the Speaker Pro Tempore

  The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Hultgren) (during the vote). There are 2 
minutes remaining.


  So the resolution was agreed to.
  The result of the vote was announced as above recorded.
  A motion to reconsider was laid on the table.
  Stated for:
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. SCALISE. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably detained. Had I been 
present, I would have voted ``yea'' on rollcall No. 603.
content.speaker: Mr. SCALISE

content.text:
Mr. REED. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably detained. Had I been 
present, I would have voted ``yea'' on rollcall No. 603.
content.speaker: Mr. REED
